file.string: Copyright 2008-%s The K-9 Dog Walkers. Portions Copyright 2006-%s the Android Open Source Project.

K-9 Mail is a powerful free email client for Android.

Its improved features include:

  • Push mail using IMAP IDLE
  • Better performance
  • Message refiling
  • Email signatures
  • Bcc-to-self
  • Folder subscriptions
  • All folder synchronization
  • Return-address configuration
  • Keyboard shortcuts
  • Better IMAP support
  • Saving attachments to SD
  • Empty Trash
  • Message sorting
  • …and more

Please note that K-9 does not support most free Hotmail accounts and, like many mail clients, has some quirks when talking to Microsoft Exchange.

Please submit bug reports, contribute new features and ask questions at https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/.
-- \nSent from my Android device with K-9 Mail. Please excuse my brevity.

In this mode, your PGP key will be used to create a cryptographic signature of an unencrypted email.
This does not encrypt the email, but verifies that it was sent from your key.

Encrypting messages ensures they can be read by the recipient, and nobody else.
Encryption will only show up if supported by all recipients, and they must have sent you an email before.
Toggle encryption by clicking this icon.
Messages will normally be encrypted by choice, or when replying to an encrypted message.
If both sender and recipients enable mutual mode, encryption will be enabled by default.
You can click here to learn more.
K-9 Mail requires OpenKeychain for end-to-end encryption.
May not be supported by some recipients
Securely share end-to-end setup with other devices
An Autocrypt Setup Message securely shares your end-to-end setup with other devices.
The message will be sent to your address:
To finish, open the message on your other device and enter the setup code.

This message contains all information to transfer your Autocrypt settings along with your secret key securely from your original device.
To set up your new device for Autocrypt, please follow the instructions that should be presented by your new device.
You can keep this message and use it as a backup for your secret key. If you want to do this, you should write down the password and store it securely.
An error occurred while sending the message. Please check your network connectivity and outgoing server configuration.
To be able to provide contact suggestions and to display contact names and photos, the app needs access to your contacts.
Copyright 2008-%s The K-9 Dog Walkers. Portions Copyright 2006-%s the Android Open Source Project.

K-9 Mail 是 Android 上一款功能强大的自由 email 客户端。

其改进的功能包括：

  • 支持 IMAP IDLE 指令来推送邮件
  • 更好的性能
  • 消息转送邮件夹
  • 邮件签名
  • 密送自己
  • 邮件夹订阅
  • 同步所有邮件夹
  • 回复地址配置
  • 快捷键
  • 更好的 IMAP 支持
  • 保存附件到 SD 卡
  • 清空回收站
  • 消息排序
  • …以及更多

请注意 K-9 不支持大部分免费 Hotmail 账户，而且和其他大部分邮件客户端一样， 在使用 Microsoft Exchange 协议时会有一些问题。

请到下述网址提交问题报告，新功能建议或者提问： https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/.

自动加密配置信息自动加密配置消息

这条消息包含所有您的旧设备上的自动加密设置与您的私钥。
要在您的新设备上设置自动加密，请按您的新设备上的提示操作。
您可以保存这条消息，并用作您的私钥的备份。如果您想这样做，您应该写下密码并安全保存。
发送消息时出现错误。请检查您的网络连接与发件服务器设置。
为了能够提供联系人建议，并显示联系人姓名和照片，应用程序需要访问你的联系人。
